snippet: Indiana put away the Orlando Magic with an 18-1 run that started late in the third quarter to win for the second time in three days and maintain the N.B.A’s best record.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers beat the Orlando Magic, 98-79; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Indiana put away the Orlando Magic with an 18-1 run that started late in the third quarter to win for the second time in three days and maintain the N.B.A’s best record.
